issue.title: [Python] Test suite fails on pandas 0.19.2
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
The test test_pandas_serialize_round_trip_multi_index fails.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1054?focusedCommentId=16017401) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Taking a closer look. Going to fix this for 0.4.0
